headline: Paris Saint-Germain thrash Atlético 4-0 in Club World Cup Opener
description: PSG largely dominated Atlético at the Rose Bowl on Sunday, in its first match since trouncing Inter Milan 5-0 to win its first Champions League title on May 31.

description: Straddling the border between Canada and the US, Lake Ontario has long served as a model for the harmonious management of a shared space. But Donald Trump's declarations undermine that balance.
